subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gardner-Webb, a Baptist college in the heart of the Bible Belt, did its best Appalachian State impression when it upset No. 20 Kentucky Wednesday, thrusting itself into the college basketball spotlight.
snippet: Gardner-Webb, a Baptist college in the heart of the Bible Belt, did its best Appalachian State impression when it upset No. 20 Kentucky Wednesday, thrusting itself into the college basketball spotlight.
